data.message: why my newly created Facebook account has been deleted? is there a glitch on Facebook? cannot find any answer on Facebook community and Help Center, kindly help please. i really need to know if there's any problem? thanks

replies.message:
Hi there. Your account may have been disabled because it is against Facebook Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. Our Community Standards can be found here: http://bit.ly/2zilsuh.
 We recommend that you use one account and close any others. -Elizabeth
its just one facebook account. its her one and only facebook account.

If two accounts are not allowed why is someone else allowed hack my account use my name and photos and now send fraudulent messages to my friends? This was reported 3-4 times and closed each time stating it does not meet Facebook fraud standards
Facebook please fix all of this

why facebook disable account?the account of my couzin same problem.she had 1 account then
facebook disable!
Same here. I already appealed but no response from facebook
facebook why you disable my mother account?i cant message her anymore!she send her valid id but still no rply almost 1 month no rply.
Everytime I appeal they always reply "Unfortunately we do not offer support for blocked or disables accounts from this email alias"

where can i contact a real facebook customer service representative. auto answer dont fix problems. please help. they have been blocking my accounts and now i need to ask help from my friends. kindly help please. tia
Facebook please response to the problem
